values: I'm back. Not much happening here. Getting another car, which is a good thing. I work with handicapped people now. It's okay. Tired. Going to bed now. Night.

I am SO tired of working. I work between 8 - 14 hours a day, 3 - 6 days a week. I don't have a social life anymore. My job at RGIS sucks ass. Next week I work everyday but Thursday, and I think that's because Thursday is my birthday. Next Friday, I start working at 6:30am and work until sometime Saturday night. I hate life. *sigh*

Anyway, I'm done bitching for now. I guess I'm gonna go clean house now.

YOU KNOW HOW MUCH I HATE QUIZZES. ONCE I START, I CAN'T STOP. IT SUCKS MY ASS!!!!! So check out what's below....
Your wise quote is: "Love is life. And if you
miss love, you miss life" by Leo Buscaglia.
Yes, love is indeed what you desire in your life. If you have it or not is another matter, but it is in your eyes the most important feeling. You tend to be a romantic dreamer and want you and your love to have that kind of perfect love that you hear about in fairytales. However that can be hard to find, but it doesn't mean you are going to stop looking.
What wise quote fits you?(pics) UPDATED


you are the cute but psycho happy bunny. You're adorable, but a little out there. It's alright,you might not have it all, but there are worse
which happy bunny are you?

You are Heroin (aka: smack, dope, brown sugar...).
You are the most dangerous drug between all other kinds. You are bold, deep, dark, mysterious, and have your own world. You are classified as class (A) illegal drugs.
What kind of Drugs are you? and how that reflect your personality?

In your eyes, people can't seem to see anything because your eyes are covered up by tears! You are constantly hurt and depressed... No one seems to understand how you feel because everyone is scared to get close to you... You long to be able to reach out and tell someone everything, and all of your problems... But you have no one to tell, or they just don't seem to want to hear what you have to say. You've been hurt many times that you don't seem to have any tears left to shed, or if you do, they're an endless river flowing... You've started to hide and bottle up all or your problems and feelings, hoping that maybe they just will go away... You want company, but at the same time, you're scared of it. Your sanctuary is your room where you can just be alone and try to throw away all of your aching pains. You're dark and mysterious and people like you for that reason. Even if you think you're all by yourself in the dark, someone is always there with you. Your special someone wants to admit and show their feelings towards you, but they're afraid of how you'll take it. Get out more and enjoy life because, it is far too long to frown your way through :)
What Lies Behind Your Eyes?

You are a Mermaid, who sits on a rock in the sea, looking and watching all humanity with< curiosity in your eyes. You have a two-sided personality! On one hand, you revel in your freedom and often prefer to live in your own private dreams.

On the other hand, humanity intrigues you and you love watching on. You are actually very kind at heart, hating to see people hurt and despise injustice! You probably have one or two special friends, who mean the world to you!

Also; you are probably quite political, wanting to see justice done in the world.

You are quite the dreamer, needing freedom and personal space to dream your little dreams. You love to escape into a book or some good music and just drift away.

Some of your good points are that you are sensitive, compassionate and a freethinker. Your bad points are that you may come across as cool and aloof to others and probably have a tendency to depression!

You are the ultimate dreamer with a kind, but troubled heart!
Are you a Princess, Enchantress, Faerie, Mermaid or Toad? (with pictures!)

Your Hidden Power Is Water


You have a rather calm soul, but when tempted will get pissed off at those who bug you. You do whatever you can in your powers to help those of your allies and have a okay taste for human kind, but you find them rather annoying on occasions.

Gem Stone: Sapphire, Eye Color:Ice
Blue,Hair Color:Dark Blue that's long and goes to your waist.

Quote:If you wait for me Then I'll come for you. Although I've travelled far, I always hold a place for you In my heart. If you think of me, If you miss me once in a while, Then I'll return to you. I'll return and fill that space in your heart
What Is Your True Hidden Power? .::Beautiful Anime Pics::.

Bringing new meaning to the word doggy style, you love dogs ... long time. How much is that puppy in the window? Well ... they charge by the hour..
What animal would you have sex with (If you had to)?

Your Heart is Blue
What Color is Your Heart?

The Goddess of Ice and Hope. You are a creative wonder. Always calm and collected, you hold the awe of many people and you are exceptionally logical. You are an inspirational beauty.
Which gorgeous goddess are you? For girls! (breath taking pics!)

INFP - the Healer
You scored 18% I to E, 42% N to S, 38% F to T, and 52% J to P!
You are more introverted than extroverted. You are more intuitive than observant, you are more feeling based than thinking based, and you prefer to go with the flow rather than having a plan. Your type can best be summarized by the word "Healer", which belongs to the larger group of idealists. You have a capacity for caring that is deeper than most. You strive for unity, are fascinated by the battles between good and evil, and can be something of an idealist. Only 1% of the population shares your type.
As a romantic partner, you are usually supprtive and nuturing, however, you have a high need for individuality. Harmony is extremely important to you as you are very affected by conflict and tension, which also makes you resist confronting your partner directly about problems. When you get angry, you usually blame yourself, rather than your partner. You can also be stubborn and unyielding when you feel you are being criticized or mistreated. You feel the most appreciated when your partner listens to you carefully. You need to be understood. You need to hear your partner express their feelings, the more often, the better. Your group summary: idealists (NF)
Your type summary: INFP



My test tracked 4 variables How you compared to other people your age and gender:
You scored higher than 17% on I to E
 You scored higher than 53% on N to S
 You scored higher than 51% on F to T
 You scored higher than 59% on J to P
Link: The LONG Scientific Personality Test written by unpretentious2 on OkCupid Free Online Dating

I'm in a state of confusion. Like that's anything new. Things are, just, strange right now. I think that's because for once everything in my life is starting to look up. I know that it won't last for long. Maybe a day or two. If I'm lucky, it'll last a week. Nah, nothing in my life goes the way that I want it to. Oh, well. The glass is definately half empty.

Anywho, made it to the semi finals of Twin Ports Idol. Performed at Grandma's Sports Garden last Thursday. I guess it went well. Made my mom cry. That's a plus. Getting tired of singing though. Not as fun as it used to be. I dunno. I think I'm in a creative rut. I can't write, can't sing, can't even color.... and I LOVE TO COLOR!!!! Could it be because, like I said earlier, that my life is starting to go right? Hmmmm... lemme think on this.... life goes right, lose creativity. Dunno if I like that one yet. It might grow on me. Nah, it won't. I'd miss my music and poetry too much. 

Now I'm starting cross stitch. It's supposedly a calming thing. IT TAKES TOO MUCH CONCENTRATION!!!!!! That's no fun. I'm only doing it for my parents anniversary. Grrr. No fun at all. 

I hate this fucking weather!!!! Warm one minute, the next the wind comes off of the lake and it gets colder than a mother fucker. Well, I suppose... now that I've become a day-walker I should get to bed. Grrrr.... all that sunlight makes me cranky. Later.

Hi! It's been a while. I've entered Twin Ports Idol and haven't seen the results yet. So... keep your fingurs crossed. My little brother is in Germany right now. They changed his orders last week. Instead of being in Germany for 2 years, he'll be there for 6 months, then he's going to Iraq for 18 months. He's not schedualed back in the states till March 2007! I swear, he gets hurt, they won't have to worry about bombing the place.... I'll go over there and kick some ass!!!! Anyway, I found an apartment. YEA!!! Bout time! For those interested, I'll give you the addy later. Just e-mail me. So, that's about it for me. I'll talk to you all later!

Yup, I'm here. Stuck in a dull life. On the bright side, i'm on some REALLY interesting pills. The down side? I don't sleep much anymore. Not that I slept much anyway. So, had an interview at Black Bear for full time slot attendant. Be nice if I got the job. It would make me happy. Grrrrrrrrr........ I need to take my pills again. I'm starting to think straight. That's not good!!!!!!! :) So, yeah. Trying to get shit together, y'know. Find a place, settle down some. It's interesting at best. I think I'm just gonna let it flow, y'know? I'm in a place where I really don't care anymore. My pills make me emotionally numb. Not quite sure if I like this, but it's not that bad. Cuz, if nothing's bothering me, then I have nothing to worry about. So, yeah. I'm gonna stop babbling now. See ya later.

Hey! I'm kinda excited! I've been nominated as one of the best poets of 2004! Makes me happy. Maybe this year I'll get the $1000 Grand Prize. Doubt it. My poetry is kinda dark. Oh well. So, not much is going on. I auditioned for Juliard. That was fun, but completely exhausting. Also very nerve racking. I find out next month whether I go back for the next round of auditions. If I do, and survive, I'll be going to Juliard this fall! If I don't, then I know there are things that I need to work on. 

In other news, my brother's coming home for the holidays!!!! Too bad he's not 21. I could take him to work with me to celebrate the New Year. I think he's getting engaged to his high school sweetheart, the poor sap. Love is a great thing. It makes for great poetry when it's over.

Speaking of which......... I have a new poem. It's called Alone. I was kinda depressed when I wrote it.

Smiling, alone
Laughing, alone
Loving, alone
Always, alone

Dark is my soul
Filling with hate
Death is its goal
Pain is my fate

I feel the pain
Surrounding me
Sadness will reign
For I am not free

Let in the sun?
There is no time
Wish I could run
Why? Because I'm

Crying, alone
Wishing, alone
Dying, alone
Always, alone

What do you think? Lemme know. In other news, I've got the chance to record my poetry. I want my friend Kris to play the music for the background. IF I can ever get in touch with him and IF he'll agree to do it. I think it would be fun. Anyway, enough babbling for now. I will talk to those in cyberspace later.

1. Who are you?
2. Are we friends?
3. When and how did we meet?
4. How have I affected you?
5. What do you think of me?
6. What's the fondest memory you have of me?
7. How long do you think we will be friends?
8. Do you love me?
9. Do you have a crush on me?
10. Would you kiss me?
11. Would you hug me?
12. Would you do anything else to me?
13. Physically, what stands out?
14. Emotionally, what stands out?
15. What do you think I should do with my life?
16. Explain my worst habit.
17. Give me a nickname and explain why you picked it.
18. What am I afraid of?
19. Describe me in one word.
20. What was your first impression?
21. Do you still think that way about me now?
22. What do you think my weakness is?
23. Do you think I should have kids?
24. What makes me happy?
25. What makes me sad?
26. What reminds you of me?
27. If you could give me anything what would it be?
28. How well do you know me?
29. What is your favorite thing to talk about with me?
30. Ever wanted to tell me something but couldn't?
31. What do I need to work on?
32. Are you going to put this on your LiveJournal and see what I say about you?

yup, life is. my brother's into wicca. then gets pissed at me when i confronted him about it. my brother treated me like shit for a while after he found out about me. now it's all pot calling kettle, and i, heh, i'm just here. i've got an audition for juliard in december. yea. i'm not ready for this. people can kiss my ass and whistle dixie. my friend princess went to san fran for american idol tryouts and didn't make it past the first stage. he's got a beautiful voice. if he couldn't make it there, what makes me think i'm going to make it at juliard? i must be out of my mind. oh, wait, been there, done that.

Well, the fourth is here. Time for all that patriotic stuff. My brother Dave received orders to ship out for his AIT training 2 weeks early. So, he's gone. Which sucks cause I didn't get a chance to say good bye. Mom's worried that he's going to get shipped overseas. I mean, I hope he doesn't, but I can't stop him from going either.

Anyway, my friend Ben is in town. That's cool as hell. I haven't seen him for a while. I'm kinda excited. Kinda trying to set him up with one of my friends, at his request, of course. I would never fling pretty available girls at him. Honest. No sarcasm involved. So, that's kinda what I'm doing. Not really. I think I know someone where they would be good for each other. Not many times do I get to do something like that.

Side note. I'm trying to type this without looking at my hands. I'm doing alright I guess. I can find most of the letters without much of a problem. My fingers are starting to cramp, though, Grr. Anyway, I've got to get to bed. I have a GREAT FUN thing I get to do tomorrow. I get to sit at 'the wall' all day with a bunch of whiny brats. I'd rather not. I just want a nice quiet day to myself. Remember, I'm a really shy person, and to be thrown into social situations where I don't know barely any of the people that are there... it's awkward. I can't even leave. I've got the car seat and my roommate and her kids would have no way to get back. Fucking conscience. I'm going to have to find a book to read. Later.

I have a homepage!!!!! Yea!!! It's about time. It's been a pain in the ass trying to get another web page set up after losing, ahem, the password to the last one. Building up again from scratch is just a HUGE pain! I never wanna do that again. So, come and check it out. Lemme know what you think.

I'm drunk........... yup, I am. I think I drank too much though.... I've got the shakes.... NEwayz..... I'm so happy. I got my last problem cleared up. I feel as if a HUGE weight has been taken off of my soul. It's such a great feeling. NEwayz, the solstice is coming up. So is my 24th b-day. It's all good. I'm gonna have the house to myself on the 20th..... YEA!!!! Peace and quiet at last! No kids yelling at each other and driving me up a wall... nobody around to hear complain about shit... no watching my language... I'll be able to center and meditate without interruption. Yea!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! "Bout fucking time. Goddess knows I get about 15 - 30 min. in and someone walks through the door and tries to talk to me. *sigh* ANYway, I entered a karaoke competition at Black Bear Casino couple days ago. I made it to the finals and got a pretty trophy. Now the bastards wanna disqualify me because my mom works there. Fuck them! They gave me the damn trophy. They told me I was going to the fucking finals. It's not my fault that my mother works there. Shit, if they want their fucking trophy back, I'll stick it up their ass for them. Stupid sons of bitches. Fucking natives... I say that and I'm 1/8th native..... tells you how much I love that. I should get going. I'm going to try to sleep this off. The shaking's bothering me. Later all.

Well, my brothers are graduating today. That's cool. Y'know, it's hard to make amends with people when they won't talk to you. Finally got one situation out of the way a couple of weeks ago. Now I need to take care of my last loose end. This is the one that I'm dreading. I've put it off for so long because it's not the easiest one to deal with. I can deal with having someone yell and scream at me, I can deal with someone treating me like shit. I can't, however, deal with someone I know so well and that I loved for so long, when I don't know how I'm going to react. The hardest thing is having to look that person in the eye and tell them that I don't love them anymore.  Was it an addiction that never goes away, or was it obsession? I don't know. How do you deal with someone that was the inspiration of all the poetry that you wrote? How do you deal with someone that you know better than you know yourself? How do you deal with someone that you gave your soul to? Especially when the last time you saw them, you ran away crying because you felt your world was crashing down around you? I don't know. If I could forget the past, hell, if everyone could forget the past life would be so much easier. Anyway, I should get going. I've got a shit load of things to do later.

I am here.... again. It's been a while. I've quit smoking.... yea. I'm changing my life around. Still very skeptic of things and people, but what do you expect. I've come to terms with my life and I figure everything that happened before is history. I've closed the door on my past. I have to forgive and forget, or life will pass me by. It sounds corny, I know, but it's true. 

Anyway, tests came back again. I'll be okay... at least for a little while. I have to go back for the same tests every 3 months to be safe, but I'm done now until the end of August.

My brothers are graduating from high school in a week! I'm so proud. Then Dave's home until July 14, then he's off to AIT training. He comes back on September 8, then leaves in October to start school at Brown University. I'm so proud of him. Damien's going to work at the Challenge Center. *sigh* They grow up so fast! Anyway, I should get going. I've got things to do. Blessed be.

Yeah, so I got the results back from my testing. They found pre-cancerous cells in my blood screen. So, yeah. A new round of testing, and a new round of doctors. Grrrrr..... Yeah, life is great.

On the flip side, I still hate people. Jake and Kris and Kat. Though not so much Kris, but I am starting to get annoyed again. Being lied to by those three is not an uncommon occurrence. Do people honestly think that I'm so gullible that I'm not going to find out the truth sooner or later? I mean seriously. I'm not that stupid. I've come to learn in the past few months that trust is something that must be earned over a number of years, not given immediately. Geez, I'm tired of the rat race of an 	existence. Tired of being played, used, and abused. So, if I become a bitch, those are the three you can blame.

Yesterday was an interesting day. I blacked out for about 17 hours. I don't remember falling asleep last night. Things happened and it was an experience that I kinda don't wanna repeat. It was too overwhelming. But anyway.......

I went to my first pow-wow today. That was fun. I've never really looked into my heritage before, but after going to that, it perked my interest. I kept asking Princess what this dress was and that dress was. Asking what the meanings of all the dresses and dances were. It was an eye opening experience. I think that I'm going to do some research and divulge into my ancestry.

I've found lyrics that describe how I've been feeling at times. Let me share them. The song is called A Few Too Many Words, by Billie Myers.

Wait a minute
What did you say
Did I hear you say
There's no real reason left for you to stay?
Under your breath I hear your soft voice break
Can we still be friends
I hear you talking but you're just not making sense
I've been hoping for a happy ending
Now I know that there won't be any

Just a few words too many in my head
A few words too many in this bed
A few words too many left unsaid
Oh I wish that we were strangers
We could start again
Start again all over again

A broken shadow falls across your face
As you hesitate
Trying to think of all the things you need to say
Bare face the truth lies at my feet
As you turn away
Sometimes silence has a way of making peace
I've been hoping for a happy ending
Now I knew that there won't be any

Just a few words too many in my head
A few words too many in this bed
A few words too many left unsaid
Oh I wish that we were strangers
We could start again
Start again all over again

Staring at the ceiling
Wondering just what you're feeling
Was it me
Or was it you
What's the difference
If I knew

Maybe I wouldn't feel so empty
If I had heard a few words too many in this bed
A few words too many left unsaid
Oh I wish that we were strangers
We could start again
Start again all over again

Geez, it's been a long day! First, Jon decides to fill his zippo. Nothing bad about that right? Well, in doing so he OVER filled it. THEN, the stupid idiot, lights it. Fire EVERYWHERE!!!!! He lit his hands on fire, the lighter, the carpet, AND much to my duress, HE LIT MY PILLOWS ON FIRE!!!!! Yeah, he burnt a hole about 2 in across and .5 in deep. MY PILLOWS...... WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA! It's a good thing I have two. So, one died. Funny thing is, the fire that was on the carpet was right beneath my chair.... so my ass almost got lit up. Hahahahahahahahaha...... my ass.... lit up.... hee hee. So, um, yeah. Working my ass off today. I have to prepare for tomorrow.... well, technically today. You see, it's Bel-taine. Oh yes. Am I prepared? Hell no. But, I gotta have SOME fun, right?

Well, as it stands, I have SOMEONE to get in touch with. DON'T MAKE ME FIND YOUR ASS. Just kidding. Actually, I already found it, remember? ;) 

So.... yeah. But I gotta run. Got some human feline problems to take care of. Though, I may not have to. Truth is, I may not have to do anything. There's others that want to take care of it for me. :) Thinking like that could get me into trouble. So, I won't do that. I've got too much too look forward to than to deal with the likes of that.... well, thing comes to mind. Catch ya on the flip side!

I was moseying around at my favorite poetry site, and decided to write a piece of haiku. Not hard to do, but not my favorite form of poetry. So I wrote this:

Spring has come at last
Like a phoenix life returns
The Earth is reborn

I think that's kinda pretty. It's the first happy poem I've written for a while. I'm kinda proud of myself. Anyway, I have my blood tests today and my psycho appointment today, so I should get going. Take care.

I went to the ER Sunday. I was throwing up blood and was in extreme pain. The doctor did the normal blood work. There was something wrong. My t-cell count was abnormally high. Higher than it's ever been. The doctor checked me for food poisoning and the flu, but that wasn't it. He even checked me for drugs. It came back negative. They did some cat scans on my abdominal area. It's not my stomach, or my appendix. Or my ovaries, for once. The blackouts, throwing up blood, sleeping for days at a time, body temperature dropping.... He said there's a possibility that I have a serious disease. I go back on Friday for more extensive blood work. He wanted to give it some time to see if my body evens itself out. 

My parents and friends tell me not to worry about it. I may have just caught a cold and it hasn't made itself know yet. I hope so. If there was ever a time that I needed a shoulder to cry on, it would be now. I wish I had someone I could just let go with. Pretending that I'm not bothered by this is exhausting. I'm scared. Very scared.

Okay, I think I have a new admirer. Okay, wraithful.... who are you? The only thing I know about you is that you put me as your friend. Why?
Anyway, not much to say, as I've already posted today. Not much has changed. I have the house COMPLETELY to myself tonight, so I think I'm gonna have some fun. :)

Another day, another entry. I dunno why I keep writing in this. Probably because I've gotten use to it, I guess. Anyway, I wish someone would give me advice. Should I tell my friend that her husband made a pass at me, or should I let it go? If I tell her, she'll be crushed. If I don't and she finds out, she'll be even more hurt. FUCK! Why me? What the fuck did I do? 
Anyway, moral dilemnas aside, I cut 4 inches off my hair a couple days ago. I just couldn't stand having it that long anymore. It was tickling my lower back. That was annoying. God, is it short, though. Oh well.... it'll GROW on me :) Actually, I think I like it this length. It's too short to be annoying, but long enough that it's not creating spiral curls everywhere. I should take a picture of me 'n the new do. It's a thought.
Okay, I was reading the last few entries and I didn't like the way they sounded. So, truth. On April 22 is the finals for the karaoke contest at Charlie's Bar on 56th and Grand. Which is, wow, 13 days away. The only reason I entered the contest is because 3 of my friends thought it would be the perfect revenge if I happened to place higher than Kat, who made it into the finals a week prior. The pre-lims are held on Thursdays at 8pm, and the winner on April 22 wins $400. Winning the money would be nice, but kicking Kat's ass would be better. I don't think I can do it, but I'm going to try.

I've managed to fuck up my wrist. Now I have to wear a stupid fucking brace. I can barely move my wrist, which makes typing like this damn near impossible. Fuck this shit. God damn brace. It's taking me forever to type this shit. Anyway, in 18 days I'm gonna have a lotta fun. But, I'm gonna go. I'm going to bed. Having insomnia sucks my ass. Talk to you later.

Here's just some random thoughts for the day.
-Save the whales. Collect the whole set.
-A day without sunshine is like, night.
-On the other hand, you have different fingurs.
-I just got lost in thought. It was unfamiliar territory.
-I wonder how much deeper the ocean would be without sponges.
-Remember, half the people you know are below average.
-Atheism is a non-prophit organization.
-For every action there is an opposite and equal criticism.
-Monday is an awful way of spending 1/7th of your life (considering I was born on one)..
-A clear conscience is a sign of bad memory.
-Plan to be spontaneous tomorrow.
-Always remember that you are unique, just like everyone else.

I can't stop these shakes. I'm shaking from the inside. It's driving me up a wall. I feel as if my soul is quaking. I dunno. Been shaking since BThe solstice. Haven't been able to sleep properly either. I wish I knew what the fuck is going on. Power flowing through my veins at levels I couldn't reach before. Abilities feeling fine tuned. Still wish I knew what the fuck's going on. Actually, I'm kinda elated that I'm getting a better grip on myself, but on the other hand, I'm sorely tempted to use what I've got. It's not right, but there you go.

I'm gonna have fun. I've found a place on 56th and Grand. Pardon me for a minute. I'm gonna scheme. In 24 days, on 56th and Grand, I'm going to stage a comeback. See, someone has been playing games with me. Thus making me an enemy. Stupid them. I get to exact my revenge on them. Field of my choice. To their utter dismay, they have no clue what's going to happen. Best thing is, there is no physical contact required. They just have to bring their HUGE ego. :) I'm happy now. I'm gonna go, I have a lotta work to do before then.

Eight am, radio on, just for a little noise. Empty house, I just needed to hear the sound of another voice. One more day, they're all running together. One more day, they're all starting to look the same. Yesterday won't go away, it hangs like an angry cloud over me. Over and done, there was so little time allowed for all that love. You said it hurt you to give it..... oh my love..... now look what it's doing to me. Ain't no sun, ain't no blue skies. The wind blows cold now that you've gone away. And tomorrow's just like today. There's a hundred percent chance of rain.

He looked into a heart so sad, and saw what noone ever had. Beneith the snow, he saw the spring. He saw the good in everything. He looks beneith each tear that's cried and somehow sees the sunny side. Even on the darkest night, he knows where to find the light. When the world starts closing in, he gives me strength to smile again. Give him thorns and he'll find the roses. Give him sand, and he'll find the sea. Give him rain and he'll find the rainbow. See what he saw in me?

Anyway......life's like that sometimes. You have to have the bad to recognize the good. You have to be willing to recognize the good when you find it, though.
It's just another day on this planet. Yippee. Not much goin' on here. Gettin' shit taken care of. Not much to say. Not like anyone reads this or anything.

Never more will they come.
A small dot in a massive freak show.
Select the perfection type 'A',
And look like a Barbie doll.
But I can't remember how life was supposed to be,
Before the magazines brought in the razor blades, and the sweet smell of corruption.
I can't remember what the world looks like,
Through eyes unjaded.
Eyes that don't compare or loathe,
Or lose there shine when the camera turns away.
Forgotten again what the truth sounds like.
The sincerity that was flushed down the toilet long ago.
Before I purged my soul with discontent,
I remember the words that used to escape these sinful lips.
"I love thee", never more.

Eh, life is........... a pain. It is never what you want it to be. You can't make it that way, but you try. If it's suppost to be that way, it will be. You can change it, but not by much. Don't mind me, I'm rambling.

On a happier note, I have two more poems being published. Yea me. That's two more fucking books I have to buy. Eh, oh well. On the other hand, it is really, really cool. Exciting and all. But I should go do dishes and shit like that. Later.

Well, I hate doctors. Since my meds haven't been working right for the past week, I called my doctor. It took him two days to call me back. Given my problems, he changed my meds and is having me increase my dosage every week for a month. Yay. I'm enthused. Eh, oh well. Anyway, I'm waiting to receive my 401K check. It should be over $2000. That would be nice. Lord knows I could use it right now. Anyway, I'm going to go do dishes.

It's just another day, and another time to write. Things here have become chaotic. I have people projecting at me from all sides. It's starting to get to me. Throwing up walls is something that I don't want to do, but I have to. But, in other news....

LIFE SUCKS! I can't seem to win. As soon as I get over one obstacle, a mess more show up. I want to channel all of the things that I'm feeling away from me, but I won't subject other people to what I'm dealing with. The drugs help, but they won't take away everything. The frustration, anger, loss, and such. But all of that is a different story. I guess I'll talk to you all later. Bubye.

Yea. I'm online again. How much fun is this. I'm so enthused. Actually, I wish that I was anywhere else but ol. I'm so tired of the day to day shit. It was my friend Sheila's 53rd b-day today. I went to see her at the bar. Do you have any idea what it's like to have someone that old break down on you and tell you she's been having suicidal thoughts? Expecially when you've just gone through the same thing? I hurt for her. She's a great lady. She has always been a good friend to me. I feel honored that she chose to talk to me about it, and then again, I feel bad that she did. I mean, everyone that she knows thinks that she's the strongest person alive. I know for a fact that I did. To see her break down like that... I told her that she was only human and when she doesn't have the strength to go on, she has at least one friend that would lend her some. Why I'm telling all of you this? I dunno. Maybe it's because no one who reads this would give a damn. I should get going here. I've got a long day tomorrow.

I took this quiz on quizilla...... I HATE QUIZZES!!!!!! Fuck this! I'm never taking another quiz as long as I live! It's not right I tell ya!!!!!

Well, it's Valentine's Day again.  The only good thing about this day is that I finally got my happy pills.  So, that's good.  Other than that, I hate Valentine's Day.  I could whine and say that I have no one to spend it with; that I'm tired of feeling empty and alone; and that my life sucks, but I won't.  So what do you do?  You put on that happy-go-lucky mask and face a day that was created to celebrate love and devotion.

I wrote a poem the other day.  This is the first time that a poem of mine doesn't rhyme.  It really doesn't have a sense of meter either.  It sounded good at the time. I dunno, you tell me.

I do not dream of you;
You do not lend yourself to a rhetoric
But move in calligraphic paths
Untraceable with words
Beautiful to behold
Drawn with a master's touch.

I dream of small gray birds
With dark-streaked wings cupped in my hands;
I fling them out to fly,
Leaving barbs and thorns upon my fingers.
I move between the pain of touch and the joy of sight:
The etching of those bodies on the sky.

I do not dream of you
But of the mysteries you hold me in,
With feathers, winds, and wizardry,
Yet if I were to speak of it,
My voice would gleam in hard, bright fragments
That you could not hope to catch or comprehend.

I wish that I could help the people that I love.  It hurts to know that I can't.  Someone close to my heart is slowly losing their mind.  I've been there... hell, I just got out of that situation.  I wish that I could talk to them and tell them to calm down and think smart.  I'm used to being the kind of person that my friends come and talk to when they're having a problem.  Right now, I'm not able to help them, and it's bothering me.  I want to talk to them and let them know that they have someone that will listen to them.  Actually, what's really bothering me is the fact that they don't need me anymore.  They never did need me.  Yeah, this is me wallowing in self pity.

Anyway, I had a set back last night.  I thought that I was in control of myself.  I'm not.  I haven't had the money to get my drugs.  I'm starting to revert back to the way that I was.  I need my drugs.  I'm getting over emotional and I'm having problems keeping myself together.  I lost my temper again.  It scared me.  I lost my cool composure.  Part of it was talking to someone that I wasn't ready to talk to.  Dregging up things that I'm not ready to deal with.  Feeling things that I'm not ready to feel.  Reliving memories that I'm not ready to face.  Closing those emotions behind a door isn't healthy, but for my sense of self and my sense of well being, that's what I have to do.

Hi!  I'm back!  I've been gone for a while doing some healing.  I'm not done yet, but I'm back now!  I'm feeling a lot better, and I'm ready to start a new phase of my life.  To hear from my friends, and I quote 'IT'S ABOUT TIME'!  

ANYWAY.... so, yeah.  What brought this on?  Well, losing two people that I love, losing my job, and losing my health.  I figure that in a month, that's enough loss.  I took that as a sign to turn my life around.  While I still have work to do, I'm not as stressed or as lost as I was.

So, where am I going now?  I'm going to start focusing on me.  One of my friends told me, 'You're not ready for any kind of serious relationship.  Even though I know you want to be loved by someone, you have too much you need to do with your life to turn your life over to someone else'.  

Well, given my tendency to spin my life around the one(s) that I love, that's advice that I'm definitely going to take.  Does that mean that I'm going to become a cold or empty person?  Never.  I still care about my friends.  I still feel emotions for a certain individual.  When or if I fall in love again, I'm not going to make them my entire life.  I can't.  It's not healthy for me, and it's not healthy for the relationship.  

So I apologize to my former love.  I've learned that you were right.  A relationship is about two people staying themselves and becoming a unit.  Each person respecting the other's boundaries and sharing a deeper part of themselves.  It's not about one person trying to conform themselves to fit completely into the other's life and therefore losing their own identity.  It's a lesson that I've learned too late.  Maybe in a few months after I've healed some more, we should get together and talk.  I think that would be nice.

Okay, back to my life.  The journey that I'm about to take is going to be a long and possibly trying time for me.  I'm going to ask my friends and family to have some patience with me as I continue my healing.  I want to say thanks to everyone that has stood by me so far.  It hasn't been a fun ride.  To those that have decided to pass from my life, I want to thank them as well.  Even if they don't know it, they have helped me  immensely.  They have taught me some very hard and valuable lessons.  I hope that one day they will decide to come back into my life.  Thank you guys.

God, life is good. I never knew how good my life could be. Shit, my life is better now than it ever was. I feel as if a weight has been lifted off of my chest. I never knew how to fight myself. I learned how to do that today. Nothing can bother me right now. Not my feelings. Not other people's feelings. I'm in a very happy place right now. All without chemical enhancements. :) Makes me happy.
